description:
Lord Ki Shou appoints Taikoubou as Seiki`s war minister, and just in time too. Bunchu`s special Sennin group, the Shisei, has come to destroy Seiki. Now, Taikoubou and his rag-tag team will have to stop the Shisei while Ki Shou and the Seiki army head to the North.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L’armée de l’Ouest avance vers le Nord
西岐軍, 北へ出陣す
